title: What are the lyrics of the new song Kamla? - Quora

response.answer_text: Birthday Special - Kamla lyric - Rajvir Jawanda - Rajvir Jawanda latest song. Kamla Lyrics by Rajvir Jawanda ft Sara Gurpal is most recent Punjabi tune with music given by G Guri. Kamla melody verses are composed by Singhjit. Tu mainu kamla kamla kehni aa mere pyaar te vi has paini aa Tu mainu kamla kamla kehni aa mere pyaar te vi has paini aa beshaq lamme kad di tu par teri akal nayani aa ni aajkal kamle nai labde te duniya bahut sayani aa ni kada maan rajya da badalde nit hi raniyan ni aajkal kamle nai labde te duniya bahut sayani aa ni kada maan rajya da badalde nit hi raniyan For full lyrics you can visit Rajvir Jawanda - Kamla Lyrics
